Articles.Content:
Ummm, I killed Jebediah. Didn't mean to, stuff happened and he took it on the chin. He's currently listed as missing, but I'm pretty sure his condition should be "vaporized."

Will he return at some point of do I need to arrange a missing man formation flyover at the air field?

Edited August 25, 2016 by shadragon
He'll find his way home, eventually. He always does.

Go to the KSP directory, then to saves, then to the save where Jeb died, then open the persistent.sfs file then find something along the lines of this (this is for Bill, but can be for another kerbal) and edit the state to Available like here:

Edited August 25, 2016 by TheDestroyer111

@TheDestroyer Cheers for that, but I'll just wait. I might even reset to a new game now that I have a base understanding of what is going on.

Took me a long time (and several aborted missions) to just get the R&D projects cashed in. For most of them to succeed, I never even had to leave the ground. DOH.
